title: "Prediction of the histology of colorectal neoplasm in white light colonoscopic images using deep learning algorithms"
excerpt: "The treatment plan of colorectal neoplasm differs based on histology. Although new endoscopic imaging systems have been developed, there are clear diagnostic thresholds and requirements in using them."
